pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Muller Plots of Evolutionary Dynamics // Create plots that combine a phylogeny and frequency dynamics. Phylogenetic input can be a generic adjacency matrix or a tree of class "phylo". Inspired by similar plots in publications of the labs of RE Lenski and JE Barrick. Named for HJ Muller (who popularised such plots) and H Wickham (whose code this package exploits).
